report.title: Species counts for indexed sites map using standard filter params
report.description: Lists locations with mappable boundary output and the number of species within them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) LEFT JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ils.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# #filters# #idlist# ) ON ils.location_id=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND ('#location_type_ids#'='0' OR l.location_type_id IN (#location_type_ids#)) AND (l.public=true OR lw.id IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

column.name: fs
column.sql: case when count>1000 then 8 else 9 end
